channel.title: regex on Today I learnt
channel.description: Recent content in regex on Today I learnt

item.title: TIL: sed regex ranges
item.description: One can use regular expressions to search for ranges of lines in sed: sed '/range-start-line-regex/,/range-end-line-regex/ other commands' $file Example I’m a Java developer so the example will be from Java world. I was on a support case and we were trying to debug a problem a customer had. As part of the debugging process we’ve requested the customer to take a number of thread dumps. The thread dumps we’ve received contain hundreds of threads.
